Astral Geyser Blast

spell id [id]: 83
effect number [effect_number]: 2
damage [damage]: 2
spec [spec]: 4224
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 10
number of effects [nreff]: 1
Damage:2
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates])
Tiny holes are blasted into the astral space. For a short time rays of astral energy will blast out of the holes and anyone hit will be severely horror marked. Anyone in the vicinity of the astral energy rays will get hit by deadly residual magic.
